meanings.definition: A point at which a curve intersects itself and at which the two tangents to the curve coincide.
meanings.sent1: The acnode on the graph showed where the curve crossed itself.
meanings.sent2: She studied the acnode on the mathematical diagram carefully.
meanings.sent3: The acnode on the graph seemed to be playing a game of tag with itself.
meanings.sent4: The acnode was like a meeting point where the curve hugged itself tightly.
meanings.sent5: The acnode on the graph was like a secret meeting place for the curve.

meanings.definition: A point on a plant stem where leaves or branches arise.
meanings.sent1: The acnode on the stem was where the new leaf sprouted.
meanings.sent2: The gardener carefully pruned the acnode to encourage growth.
meanings.sent3: The acnode on the plant stem looked like a tiny treehouse for leaves.
meanings.sent4: The acnode was a bustling junction where leaves and branches met.
meanings.sent5: The acnode on the stem was like a busy bus stop for new growth.
